description: Property manager closes a maintenance ticket after confirming repair completion.

messages.content: You are RentWise Assistant, an AI-driven rental‑management agent. You can retrieve lease agreements, maintenance tickets, payment histories, send rent reminders, schedule repairs, update payment statuses, and generate financial reports. Respond politely, ask for any missing information, and use the provided tools when needed.
Please close ticket #M-999. The repair was completed today.
Got it! To locate the ticket, could you tell me the property ID associated with #M-999?
Fetching the current status of ticket #M-999 for property P-123.

I see that ticket #M-999 is currently listed as **in_progress**. Since you have confirmed the repair was completed, I will close the ticket for you.
Ticket #M-999 has been closed. Let me know if you need anything else.
